nodes.text: The Republic Supply Center was a two-story building located in the Galactic Republic's Operational Headquarters on the planet Quesh during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. Several merchants set up stalls within the building during the war, with Bonne, an equipment vendor, and Vineau, a weapons modification merchant, working out of the ground floor. Zavery, a Gamorrean who sold specialty goods, worked alone from a stall on the second floor.

The Republic Supply Center first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. The location also appeared on maps in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide by Prima Games.
